name: Super Neat Cat
storyline: Can this neat little cat save their home from a Nanobot-Virus? This virus was created by an ancient civilization. It has infected the world and has been taking over the wildlife. Their first time leaving their home, this cat will travel far to try and find the source of this destruction. Can this neat little cat do more than they ever thought they could?
summary: A retro style simple platforming adventure! A small cute cat must save their world from an ancient Nanobot Virus. Explore a beautiful pixel art land as you try and find the source of this destruction.

videos.name: Dev Diary
videos.title: Neat Games Devlog #21 - STEAM Trailer Super Neat Cat - First edit and more!
